Description
Are you self employed or do you work for someone else?
Respondent's occupation
Prestige of respondent's occupation
Respondent's industry.
Are you currently married, widowed, divorced, separated, or have you never been married?
Code type of marriage.
If currently married or widowed, have you ever been divorced or legally separated?
If currently married, separated, or divorced, have you ever been widowed?
Last week, was your spouse working full time, part time, going to school, keeping house, or something else?
If your spouse was working full time or part time last week, how many hours did they work?
If your spouse had a job but wasn't working last week, how many hours a week does your spouse usually work?
If your spouse is retired, in school, keeping house, or something else, did they ever work for as long as one year?
Last week, what was your partner's job status -- working full time, part time, going to school, keeping house, or something else?
If your partner is retired, in school, keeping house, or something else, did they ever work for as long as one year?
If your partner was working full or part time last week, how many hours did they work at all their jobs?
If your partner had a job, but was not working last week, how many hours a week do they usually work at all their jobs?
What is the respondent's spouse's occupation?
What is the prestige of the respondent's spouse's occupation?
What is the respondent's spouse's industry?
What is your partner's occupation?
What industry does your partner's occupation belong to?
Was your father/stepfather/male relative you were living with when you were 16 an employee, self-employed without employees, or self-employed with employees?
Father's occupation
Prestige of respondent's father's occupation
Father's industry
At this job, was [mother/stepmother/female relative you were living with when you were 16] an employee, self-employed without employees, or self-employed with employees?
Mother's occupation
Prestige of respondent's mother's occupation
Mother's industry code

How many brothers and sisters did you have? Please count those born alive, but no longer living, as well as those alive now. Also include stepbrothers and stepsisters, and children adopted by your parents.
How many children have you ever had? Please count all that were born alive at any time (including any you had from a previous marriage).
Respondent's age
How old were you when your first child was born?
Respondent's education
What is the highest grade in elementary school or high school that your father finished and got credit for?
What is the highest grade in elementary school or high school that your mother finished and got credit for?
What was the respondent's degree?
What is the Respondent's sex?
What race do you consider yourself?
Which of these categories comes closest to the type of place you were living in when you were 16 years old?
In what state or foreign country were you living when you were 16 years old?
If the state named is the same state the respondent lives in now, when they were 16 years old were they living in this same city/town/county?
If not living with both their own mother and father, what happened?
Did their mother ever work for pay for as long as a year, while they were growing up?

Thinking about the time when you were 16 years old, compared with American families in general then, would you say your family income was: far below average, below average, average, above average, or far above average? Just your best guess.
Were you born in this country?
Were all of your four grandparents born in this country? If no, how many were born outside the United States?
How many members are there in your household aged 6 to 12 years old?

Just thinking about your family now--those people in the household who are related to you . . . How many persons in the family (including yourself) earned any money in (2019/2020) from any job or employment?
In which of these groups did your total family income, from all sources, fall last year before taxes, that is?
In which of these groups did your total family income, from all sources, fall last year? That is, before taxes.
In which of these groups did your earnings from (OCC), from all sources for (2019/2020) fall? That is, before taxes or other deductions.
Region of interview.
Generally speaking, do you usually think of yourself as a Republican, Democrat, Independent, or what?
In 2016, you remember that Hillary Clinton ran for President on the Democratic ticket against Donald Trump for the Republicans. Do you remember for sure whether or not you voted in that election?
Did you vote for Hillary Clinton or Donald Trump?
Who would you have voted for, for president, if you had voted?

We hear a lot of talk these days about liberals and conservatives. I'm going to show you a seven-point scale on which the political views that people might hold are arranged from extremely liberal--point 1--to extremely conservative--point 7. Where would you place yourself on this scale?
For each of these problems, do you think we're spending too much money, too little money, or about the right amount on space exploration programs?
Are we spending too much, too little, or about the right amount on improving and protecting the environment?
Thinking of how much the government in Washington is spending on improving and protecting the nation's health, do you think we are spending too much, too little, or about the right amount?
Thinking of the total amount of money the government spends, how much do you think it should spend on solving the problems of big cities?
Thinking of the total amount of money the government spends, how much do you think it should spend on halting the rising crime rate?
Thinking of the amount of money the government spends, are we spending too much, too little, or about the right amount on dealing with drug addiction?
Thinking of the amount of money the government spends, are we spending too much, too little, or about the right amount on improving the nation's education system?
Thinking of how much the government in Washington is spending on improving the conditions of Blacks, do you think we are spending too much, too little, or about the right amount?
For each of these problems, do you think we're spending too much money, too little money, or about the right amount on the military, armaments and defense?
For each of these problems, do you think we're spending too much money, too little money, or about the right amount on foreign aid?
Are we spending too much, too little, or about the right amount on welfare?
Are we spending too much, too little, or about the right amount on Highways and bridges?
Are we spending too much, too little, or about the right amount on Social Security?
Thinking of how much the government in Washington is spending on mass transportation, do you think we are spending too much, too little, or about the right amount?
Thinking of how much the government in Washington is spending on parks and recreation, do you think we are spending too much, too little, or about the right amount?
Thinking of the total amount of money the government spends, how much do you think it should spend on assistance for childcare?
Are we spending too much, too little, or about the right amount on Supporting scientific research?
Are we spending too much, too little, or about the right amount on developing alternative energy sources?
For each of these problems, do you think we're spending too much money, too little money, or about the right amount on space exploration?
Are we spending too much, too little, or about the right amount on improving and protecting the environment?
Thinking of how much the government in Washington is spending on health, do you think we are spending too much, too little, or about the right amount?
Thinking of the total amount of money the government spends, how much do you think it should spend on assistance to big cities?
Thinking of the amount of money the government spends, are we spending too much, too little, or about the right amount on law enforcement?
Thinking of the amount of money the government spends, are we spending too much, too little, or about the right amount on drug rehabilitation?
Thinking of the amount of money the government spends, are we spending too much, too little, or about the right amount on education?
Are we spending too much, too little, or about the right amount on Assistance to Blacks?
Thinking of the total amount of money the government spends, how much do you think it should spend on national defense?
For each of these problems, do you think we're spending too much money, too little money, or about the right amount on assistance to other countries?
Are we spending too much, too little, or about the right amount on assistance to the poor?

On a scale from 1 to 7, with 1 meaning that the government ought to reduce the income differences between rich and poor, and 7 meaning that the government should not concern itself with reducing income differences, what score comes closest to the way you feel?
Do you consider the amount of federal income tax which you have to pay as too high, about right, or too low?

There are always some people whose ideas are considered bad or dangerous by other people. For instance, somebody who is against all churches and religion. If such a person wanted to make a speech in your city/town/community against churches and religion, should he be allowed to speak, or not?

There are always some people whose ideas are considered bad or dangerous by other people. For instance, somebody who is against all churches and religion. Should such a person be allowed to teach in a college or university, or not?

There are always some people whose ideas are considered bad or dangerous by other people. For instance, somebody who is against all churches and religion. If some people in your community suggested that a book he wrote against churches and religion should be taken out of your public library, would you favor removing this book, or not?
If a person who believes that Blacks are genetically inferior wanted to make a speech in your community claiming that Blacks are inferior, should he be allowed to speak, or not?
Should a person who believes that Blacks are genetically inferior be allowed to teach in a college or university, or not?
If some people in your community suggested that a book he wrote which said Blacks are inferior should be taken out of your public library, would you favor removing this book, or not?
Should an admitted Communist be allowed to make a speech in your community, or not?
Should an admitted Communist be fired from teaching in a college, or not?

Suppose a man who admits he is a Communist wrote a book which is in your public library. Somebody in your community suggests that the book should be removed from the library. Would you favor removing it, or not?
Consider a person who advocates doing away with elections and letting the military run the country. If this person wanted to make a speech in your community, should he be allowed to speak, or not?
Should a person who advocates doing away with elections and letting the military run the country be allowed to teach in a college or university, or not?
Suppose somebody in your community wrote a book advocating doing away with elections and letting the military run the country. Would you favor removing this book from the public library, or not?
If an admitted homosexual wanted to make a speech in your community, should they be allowed to speak, or not?
Should an admitted homosexual be allowed to teach in a college or university, or not?

If some people in your community suggested that a book a man who admits that he is homosexual wrote in favor of homosexuality should be taken out of your public library, would you favor removing this book, or not?
If a Muslim clergyman who preaches hatred of the United States wanted to make a speech in your community preaching hatred of the United States, should he be allowed to speak, or not?
Should a Muslim clergyman who preaches hatred of the United States be allowed to teach in a college or university, or not?

If some people in your community suggested that a book written by a Muslim clergyman which preaches hatred of the United States should be taken out of your public library, would you favor removing this book, or not?
Do you favor or oppose the death penalty for people convicted of murder?
Would you favor or oppose a law which would require a person to obtain a police permit before they could buy a gun?
What is your religious preference? Is it Protestant, Catholic, Jewish, some other religion, or no religion?
What specific denomination is that, if any? Probe for exact denomination.
What specific denomination is that, if any? (PROBE FOR EXACT DENOMINATION) (If you are Protestant.)
Do you consider yourself Orthodox, Conservative, Reform or none of these Jewish denominations?
Fundamentalism/Liberalism of respondent's religion.
How often do you attend religious services? (Use categories as probes, if necessary.)
About how often do you pray?
Please select the answer that comes closest to your own personal opinion about the following statement: Under certain conditions,the pope is infallible when he speaks on matters of faith and morals.
In what religion were you raised?
If raised Protestant, what specific denomination is that, if any? (Probe for exact denomination).
If raised Protestant, what specific denomination is that, if any? (Probe for exact denomination).
Were you raised Orthodox, Conservative, Reform, or none of these Jewish denominations?
What type of Fundamentalism/Liberalism of Religion did the Respondent grow up in?
If the respondent is currently married, what is their spouse's religious preference? Is it Protestant, Catholic, Jewish, some other religion, or no religion?
What specific denomination is that, if any? (PROBE FOR EXACT DENOMINATION)
Please specify denomination:
What is your spouse's religious preference? Is it Protestant, Catholic, Jewish, some other religion, or no religion? Does he/she consider him/herself Orthodox, Conservative, Reform or none of these?
What is your spouse's religious preference? Is it Protestant, Catholic, Jewish, some other religion, or no religion? How would you describe the fundamentalist/liberalism of religion of your spouse?
What is your partner's religious preference? Is it Protestant, Catholic, Jewish, some other religion, or no religion? (Probe for exact denomination).
What specific denomination is that, if any? (PROBE FOR EXACT DENOMINATION) (If your partner is Protestant, Catholic, Jewish, or some other religion.)
What specific denomination is that, if any? (PROBE FOR EXACT DENOMINATION) (If your partner is some other religion.)
If Jewish, does your partner consider themselves Orthodox, Conservative, Reform, or none of these? (Probe for exact denomination).
Are there any whites (for black respondents) or blacks (for non-black respondents) living in this neighborhood now?

Some people say that because of past discrimination, Blacks should be given preference in hiring and promotion. Others say that such preference in hiring and promotion of Blacks is wrong because it discriminates against Whites. What about your opinion? Are you for or against preferential hiring and promotion of Blacks? If you are in favor, how strongly do you favor preferences in hiring and promotion? If you are opposed, how strongly do you oppose preferences in hiring and promotion?

Do you agree strongly, agree somewhat, neither agree nor disagree, disagree somewhat, or disagree strongly with the following statement: Irish, Italians, Jewish and many other minorities overcame prejudice and worked their way up. Blacks should do the same without special favors.
Taking all together, how would you say things are these days--would you say that you are very happy, pretty happy, or not too happy?
Taking things all together, how would you describe your marriage? Would you say that your marriage is very happy, pretty happy, or not too happy?
Taking things all together, would you say that your relationship with your partner is very happy, pretty happy, or not too happy?
Would you say your own health, in general, is excellent, good, fair, or poor?
In general, do you find life exciting, pretty routine, or dull?
As far as the people running Banks and financial institutions are concerned, would you say you have a great deal of confidence, only some confidence, or hardly any confidence at all in them?
As far as the people running major companies in this country are concerned, would you say you have a great deal of confidence, only some confidence, or hardly any confidence at all in them?
As far as the people running organized religion in this country are concerned, would you say you have a great deal of confidence, only some confidence, or hardly any confidence at all in them?
As far as the people running education in this country are concerned, would you say you have a great deal of confidence, only some confidence, or hardly any confidence at all in them?

As far as the people running the executive branch of the federal government in this country are concerned, would you say you have a great deal of confidence, only some confidence, or hardly any confidence at all in them?
As far as the people running organized labor in this country are concerned, would you say you have a great deal of confidence, only some confidence, or hardly any confidence at all in them?

Thinking of the people running institutions in this country, how much confidence do you have in the press? Would you say you have a great deal of confidence, only some confidence, or hardly any confidence at all?

Thinking of the people running institutions in this country, how much confidence do you have in medicine? Would you say you have a great deal of confidence, only some confidence, or hardly any confidence at all?

Thinking of the people running institutions in this country, how much confidence do you have in TV? Would you say you have a great deal of confidence, only some confidence, or hardly any confidence at all?

Thinking of the people running institutions in this country, how much confidence do you have in the U.S. Supreme Court? Would you say you have a great deal of confidence, only some confidence, or hardly any confidence at all?

Thinking of the people running institutions in this country, how much confidence do you have in the scientific community? Would you say you have a great deal of confidence, only some confidence, or hardly any confidence at all?
As far as the people running Congress are concerned, would you say you have a great deal of confidence, only some confidence, or hardly any confidence at all in them?
As far as the people running the Military are concerned, would you say you have a great deal of confidence, only some confidence, or hardly any confidence at all in them?
If you had to choose, which thing on this list would you pick as the most important for a child to learn to prepare him or her for life? To obey
If you had to choose, which thing on this list would you pick as the most important for a child to learn to prepare him or her for life? To be well-liked or popular
If you had to choose, which thing on this list would you pick as the most important for a child to learn to prepare him or her for life? To think for himself or herself

If you had to choose, which thing on this list would you pick as the most important for a child to learn to prepare him or her for life? Which comes next in importance? Which comes third? Which comes fourth? To work hard.

If you had to choose, which thing on this list would you pick as the most important for a child to learn to prepare him or her for life? Which comes next in importance? Which comes third? Which comes fourth? To help others when they need help.
How often do you spend a social evening with relatives?
How often do you spend a social evening with someone who lives in your neighborhood?
How often do you spend a social evening with friends who live outside the neighborhood?
How often do you go to a bar or tavern?
Thinking about the next 12 months, how likely do you think it is that you will lose your job or be laid off--very likely, fairly likely, not too likely, or not at all likely?
About how easy would it be for you to find a job with another employer with approximately the same income and fringe benefits you now have? Would you say very easy, somewhat easy, or not easy at all?
On the whole, how satisfied are you with the work you do -would you say you are very satisfied, moderately satisfied, a little dissatisfied, or very dissatisfied?
If you were to get enough money to live as comfortably as you would like for the rest of your life, would you continue to work or would you stop working?
If you were asked to use one of four names for your social class, which would you say you belong in: the lower class, the working class, the middle class, or the upper class?
In our society there are groups which tend to be towards the top and those that are towards the bottom. Where would you put yourself on this scale?
So far as you and your family are concerned, would you say that you are pretty well satisfied with your present financial situation, more or less satisfied, or not satisfied at all?
During the last few years, has your financial situation been getting better, worse, or has it stayed the same?
Compared with American families in general, how would you rate your family's income? Far below average, below average, average, above average, or far above average? (Just your best guess)
Does your (or your spouse's) job have a supervisor to whom they are directly responsible?
If yes, does that supervisor have a supervisor to whom he or she is directly responsible?
Do you (or your spouse or partner) have a supervisor on your job to whom you are (or he/she is) directly responsible?
If yes, does that person have a supervisor on the job to whom they are directly responsible?
At work, do you or your spouse supervise anyone who is directly responsible to you or your spouse?
Do you or your spouse supervise anyone who is the direct supervisor of somebody else?
In your spouse or partner's job, do they supervise anyone who is directly responsible to them?
If yes, do any of those persons supervise anyone else?
Do you (or your spouse or partner) belong to a labor union?

Compared to your parents when they were the age you are now, do you think your own standard of living now is much better, somewhat better, about the same, somewhat worse, or much worse than theirs was?
Should it be possible for a pregnant woman to obtain a legal abortion if there is a strong chance of serious defect in the baby?
Should it be possible for a pregnant woman to obtain a legal abortion if she is married and does not want any more children?
Should it be possible for a pregnant woman to obtain a legal abortion if her own health is seriously endangered by the pregnancy?
If the family has a very low income and cannot afford any more children?
If she becomes pregnant as a result of rape?
If the woman is not married and does not want to marry the man?
If the woman wants it for any reason?
What do you think is the ideal number of children for a family to have?
Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree that methods of birth control should be available to teenagers between the ages of 14 and 16 if their parents do not approve?
Would you be for or against sex education in the public schools?

There has been a lot of discussion about the way morals and attitudes about sex are changing in this country. If a man and a woman have sexual relations before marriage, do you think it is always wrong, almost always wrong, wrong only sometimes, or not wrong at all?
In terms of sex relations before marriage, do you think it is always wrong, almost always wrong, wrong only sometimes, or not wrong at all for people who are 14 to 16 years old?
What is your opinion about a married person having sexual relations with someone other than the marriage partner - is it always wrong, almost always wrong, wrong only sometimes, or not wrong at all?
What about sexual relations between two adults of the same sex - do you think it is always wrong, almost always wrong, wrong only sometimes, or not wrong at all?
Which statement comes closest to your feelings about pornography laws?
Have you seen an X-rated movie in the last year?
Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree that it is sometimes necessary to discipline a child with a good, hard spanking?
When a person has a disease that cannot be cured, do you think doctors should be allowed by law to end the patient's life by some painless means if the patient and their family request it?
Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person has an incurable disease?
Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person has gone bankrupt?
Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person has dishonored his or her family?
Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person is tired of living and ready to die?
Are there any situations you can imagine in which you would approve of a policeman striking an adult male citizen?
Would you approve of a policeman striking a citizen who had said vulgar and obscene things to the policeman?
Would you approve of a policeman striking a citizen who was being questioned as a suspect in a murder case?
Would you approve of a policeman striking a citizen who was attempting to escape from custody?
Would you approve of a policeman striking a citizen who was attacking the policeman with his fists?
Is there any area right around here--that is, within a mile--where you would be afraid to walk alone at night?
Do you happen to have in your home (or garage) any guns or revolvers?
Is it a pistol, shotgun, rifle, or what? Code all that apply.
If yes: coded if shotgun
If the respondent answered yes to owning a gun, coded if rifle.
Do any of these guns personally belong to the respondent?
Does the respondent or their spouse go hunting?
On an average day, how often does the respondent read the newspaper?
On an average day, how many hours does the respondent watch television?
Do you have a telephone? May I have your name and (one of your) telephone number(s) just in case I have left something out in this interview?
What was the respondent's attitude toward the interview?
Was respondent's understanding of the questions good?
What form of split questionnaire was asked?
Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree with the statement: A working mother can establish just as warm and secure a relationship with her children as a mother who does not work?
Please indicate whether you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree with the statement: A preschool child is likely to suffer if his or her mother works.

Please indicate whether you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree with the statement: It is much better for everyone involved if the man is the achiever outside the home and the woman takes care of the home and family.
On the average Negroes/Blacks/African-Americans have worse jobs, income, and housing than white people. Do you think these differences are mainly due to discrimination?

On the average Negroes/Blacks/African-Americans have worse jobs, income, and housing than white people. Do you think these differences are because most Negroes/Blacks/African-Americans have less in-born ability to learn?

On the average Negroes/Blacks/African-Americans have worse jobs, income, and housing than white people. Do you think these differences are because most Negroes/Blacks/African-Americans don't have the chance for education that it takes to rise out of poverty?

On the average (Negroes/Blacks/African-Americans) have worse jobs, income, and housing than white people. Do you think these differences are because most (Negroes/Blacks/African-Americans) just don't have the motivation or willpower to pull themselves up out of poverty?

Next, here are issues that some people tell us are important. Where would you place yourself on the scale from 1 to 5, where 1 means the government should do everything possible to improve the standard of living of all poor Americans and 5 means it is not the government's responsibility and each person should take care of himself, or haven't you made up your mind on this?

Where would you place yourself on the scale from 1 to 5, where 1 means the government should be doing more to solve our country's problems and 5 means it is trying to do too many things that should be left to individuals and private businesses, or haven't you made up your mind on this?

In general, where would you place yourself on the scale from 1 to 5, where 1 means the government should be responsible for helping people pay for doctors and hospital bills and 5 means that people should take care of these things themselves, or haven't you made up your mind on this?

Where would you place yourself on the scale from 1 to 5, where 1 means the government has a special obligation to help improve Black's living standards and 5 means that it should not be giving special treatment to Blacks, or haven't you made up your mind on this?
Which of the statements comes closest to expressing what you believe about God?
Would you say you have been born again or have had a born again experience - that is, a turning point in your life when you committed yourself to Christ?
Have you ever tried to encourage someone to believe in Jesus Christ or to accept Jesus Christ as their savior?
Do people in this group tend to be rich or poor? Hispanic Americans?
Do people in this group tend to be hardworking or lazy? Hispanic-Americans?
Do people in this group tend to be unintelligent or tend to be intelligent? Hispanic, Latinos?
Would you be very much in favor, somewhat in favor, neither in favor nor opposed, somewhat opposed, or very much opposed to living in a neighborhood where half of your neighbors were blacks?
Would you be very in favor of having a close relative marry a Black person, somewhat in favor, neither in favor nor opposed, somewhat opposed, or very opposed to it happening?
Do you have a close relative who married an Asian American person?
Do you have a close relative who married a Hispanic or Latino person?
Would you be very in favor of having a close relative marry a White person, somewhat in favor, neither in favor nor opposed, somewhat opposed, or very opposed to it happening?
If employed, are the people who work where you work all white, mostly white, about half and half, mostly black, or all black?

What do you think the chances are these days that a white person won't get a job or promotion while an equally or less qualified black person gets one instead? Is this very likely, somewhat likely, or not very likely to happen these days?

Are you for or against preferential hiring and promotion of women? If for, do you favor preference in hiring and promotion strongly or not strongly? If against, do you oppose the preference in hiring and promotion strongly or not strongly?

What do you think the chances are these days that a man won't get a job or promotion while an equally or less qualified woman gets one instead? Is this very likely, somewhat likely, somewhat unlikely, or very unlikely these days?
Because of past discrimination, employers should make special efforts to hire and promote qualified women. Do you strongly agree, agree, neither agree nor disagree?
To what extent do you consider yourself a religious person? Are you very religious, moderately religious, slightly religious, or not religious at all?
To what extent do you consider yourself a spiritual person? Are you very spiritual, moderately spiritual, slightly spiritual, or not spiritual at all?
Can you speak a language other than English (Spanish)?
What other language(s) do you speak? First response.
What other language(s) do you speak? Second response.
How well do you speak that language? Read categories.
Which language do you speak more fluently?
Do you personally ever use a computer at home, at work, or at some other location?
Do you have access to the Internet in your home through an Internet-enabled mobile device like a smart phone or tablet?
About how many minutes per week do you spend sending and answering electronic mail or e-mail?
About how many hours per week do you spend sending and answering electronic mail or e-mail?
Other than for e-mail, do you ever use the Internet or World Wide Web?

Not counting e-mail, about how many hours per week do you use the Web? Include time spent visiting regular web sites and using interactive Internet services like social media, streaming services, chat rooms, online conferencing services, discussion boards or forums.

Not counting e-mail, about how many minutes per week do you use the Web? Include time spent visiting regular web sites and using interactive Internet services like social media, streaming services, chat rooms, online conferencing services, discussion boards or forums.
In your day-to-day life, how often do you feel that you are treated with less courtesy or respect than other people?
In your day-to-day life how often have any of the following things happened to you? You receive poorer service than other people at restaurants or stores.
In your day-to-day life how often have any of the following things happened to you? People act as if they think you are not smart.
In your day-to-day life how often have any of the following things happened to you? People act as if they are afraid of you.
In your day-to-day life how often have any of the following things happened to you? You are threatened or harassed.
In general, would you say your quality of life is...?
In general, how would you rate your physical health?
In general, how would you rate your mental health, including your mood and your ability to think?
In general, how would you rate your satisfaction with your social activities and relationships?

In general, please rate how well you carry out your usual social activities and roles. This includes activities at home, at work and in your community, and responsibilities as a parent, child, spouse, employee, friend, etc.
To what extent are you able to carry out your everyday physical activities such as walking, climbing stairs, carrying groceries, or moving a chair?
In the past seven days, how often have you been bothered by emotional problems such as feeling anxious, depressed or irritable?
In the past seven days, how would you rate your fatigue on average?
Do you work in your own family business or farm?
For each statement, please tell me if you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree. Because of science and technology, there will be more opportunities for the next generation.
Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree that science makes our way of life change too fast?

Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree that even if it brings no immediate benefits, scientific research that advances the frontiers of knowledge is necessary and should be supported by the federal government?
Do you think that the balance has been strongly in favor of the benefits, or only slightly?
Do you think that the balance has been strongly in favor of the harmful results, or only slightly?
Is it true or false that antibiotics kill viruses as well as bacteria?
How interested are you in local school issues? (Very interested, moderately interested, or not at all interested?)
Are you very interested, moderately interested, or not at all interested in issues about new scientific discoveries?
Are you very interested, moderately interested, or not at all interested in economic issues and business conditions?
Are you very interested, moderately interested, or not at all interested in issues about the use of new inventions and technologies?
Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree that scientific researchers are dedicated people who work for the good of humanity?

Which of these statements applies to you? Code one only.

Thinking of your household's total income, including all the sources of income of all the members who contribute to it, how important do you think it is for getting ahead in life to come from a wealthy family?

Thinking of your household's total income, including all the sources of income of all the members who contribute to it, how important do you think it is for getting ahead in life to have well-educated parents?

Thinking of your household's total income, including all the sources of income of all the members who contribute to it, how important do you think it is for getting ahead in life to have a good education yourself?
Thinking of your household's total income, including all the sources of income of all the members who contribute to it, how important do you think it is for getting ahead in life to hard work?

Thinking of your household's total income, including all the sources of income of all the members who contribute to it, how important do you think it is for getting ahead in life to know the right people?

Thinking of your household's total income, including all the sources of income of all the members who contribute to it, how important do you think it is for getting ahead in life to have political connections?

Thinking of your household's total income, including all the sources of income of all the members who contribute to it, how important do you think it is for getting ahead in life to a person’s religion?

Please indicate whether you strongly agree, agree, neither agree nor disagree, disagree, or strongly disagree with the following statement: The way things are in America, people like me and my family have a good chance of improving our standard of living-- do you agree or disagree?
To what extent do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Large differences in income are necessary for America's prosperity.
To what extent do you agree or disagree with the following statement? Allowing business to make good profits is the best way to improve everyone's standard of living.
About how much do you think a doctor in general practice earns?
How much do you think a salesclerk earns?
How much do you think a chairman of a large national corporation earns?
How much do you think an unskilled worker in a factory earns?
How much do you think a cabinet minister in the federal government earns?
About how much do you think a doctor in general practice should earn?
How much do you think a salesclerk should earn?
How much do you think a chairman of a large national corporation should earn?
How much do you think an unskilled worker in a factory should earn?
How much do you think a cabinet minister in the federal government should earn?
To what extent do you agree or disagree with the following statements? Differences in income in America are too large.
How much do you agree or disagree with the statement that it is the responsibility of the government to reduce the differences in income between people with high incomes and those with low incomes?
The government should provide a decent standard of living for the unemployed.
Generally, how would you describe taxes in America today for those with high incomes? Taxes are ...
Do you think people with high incomes should pay a larger share of their income in taxes than those with low incomes, the same share, or a smaller share?
In your opinion, in America how much conflict is there between poor people and rich people?
In your opinion, in America how much conflict is there between the working class and the middle class?
In your opinion, in America how much conflict is there between management and workers?
In your opinion, in America how much conflict is there between young people and older people?
Turning to international differences, to what extent do you agree or disagree with the following statement: Present economic differences between rich and poor countries are too large?

Turning to international differences, to what extent do you agree or disagree with the following statement: People in wealthy countries should make an additional tax contribution to help people in poor countries?
Is it just or unjust - right or wrong - that people with higher incomes can buy better health care than people with lower incomes?
Is it just or unjust - right or wrong - that people with higher incomes can buy better education for their children than people with lower incomes?
In deciding how much people ought to earn, how important should responsibility for the job be in deciding pay?
In deciding how much people ought to earn, how important should the number of years spent in education and training be, in your opinion?
In deciding how much people ought to earn, how important should whether the person has children to support be, in your opinion?
In deciding how much people ought to earn, how important should how well he or she does the job be, in your opinion?
These five diagrams show different types of society. Please read the descriptions and look at the diagrams and decide which you think best describes America today - which diagram comes closest?
What do you think America ought to be like - which type of society would you prefer?
Do you agree or disagree that homosexual couples should have the right to marry one another?
Family life often suffers because men concentrate too much on their work. Do you agree or disagree?
Generally speaking, would you say that people can be trusted or that you can't be too careful in dealing with people?
To what extent do you agree or disagree with the statement that the U.S. would be a better country if religion had less influence?
How much do you agree or disagree with the statement that private enterprise is the best way to solve America's economic problems?
Please tell us the one thing you think should be America's highest priority, the most important thing it should do.
And which one do you think should be America’s next highest priority, the second most important thing it should do?
How much do you agree or disagree with the statement: 'Modern science will solve our environmental problems with little change to our way of life'?
How much do you agree or disagree with the statement: 'We worry too much about the future of the environment and not enough about prices and jobs today'?
How much do you agree or disagree with the statement: 'Almost everything we do in modern life harms the environment'?

There are always some people whose ideas are considered bad or dangerous by other people. For instance, somebody who is against all churches and religion. If such a person wanted to make a speech in your community against churches and religion, should this person be allowed to speak, or not?
If some people in your community suggested that a book written against churches and religion should be taken out of your public library, would you favor removing this book, or not?
If a person who believes that Blacks are genetically inferior wanted to make a speech in your community claiming that Blacks are inferior, should this person be allowed to speak, or not?
If some people in your community suggested that a book this person wrote which said Blacks are inferior should be taken out of your public library, would you favor removing this book, or not?
Should a self-identified Communist be allowed to make a speech in your community, or not?
Should a self-identified Communist be fired from teaching in a college, or not?

Suppose a self-identified Communist wrote a book which is in your public library. Somebody in your community suggests that the book should be removed from the library. Would you favor removing it, or not?

Consider a person who advocates doing away with elections and letting the military run the country. If this person wanted to make a speech in your community, should this person be allowed to speak, or not?
Suppose somebody in your community wrote a book advocating doing away with elections and letting the military run the country. Would you favor removing this book from the public library, or not?
If a gay person wanted to make a speech in your community, should this person be allowed to speak, or not?
If somebody in your community suggests that a book a gay person wrote in favor of homosexuality should be taken out of your public library, would you favor removing it, or not?

If an Islamic religious leader who preaches hatred of the United States wanted to make a speech in your community preaching hatred of the United States, should this person be allowed to speak, or not?

If some people in your community suggested that a book written by an Islamic religious leader which preaches hatred of the United States should be taken out of your public library, would you favor removing this book, or not?

On a scale of 0 to 10, how much do you personally trust university research centers? 0 means you do not trust them at all, and 10 means you trust them completely.
On a scale of 0 to 10, how much do you personally trust the news media? 0 means you do not trust them at all, and 10 means you trust them completely.
On a scale of 0 to 10, how much do you personally trust Business and industry? 0 means you do not trust it at all, and 10 means you trust it completely.

It is the responsibility of private companies to reduce the differences in pay between their employees with high pay and those with low pay.

In our society there are groups which tend to be towards the top and groups which tend to be towards the bottom. On a scale that runs from top to bottom, where would you put yourself now?

In our society there are groups which tend to be towards the top and groups which tend to be towards the bottom. On a scale that runs from top to bottom, if you think about the family that you grew up in, where did they fit in then?

In our society there are groups which tend to be towards the top and groups which tend to be towards the bottom. On a scale that runs from top to bottom, thinking ahead 10 years from now, where do you think you will be on a scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is the top and 10 is the bottom?
How fair or unfair do you think the income distribution is in America?

Some people think that major companies ought to reduce the pay differences between employees with high pay and those with low pay, perhaps by reducing the pay of executives or by increasing the pay of unskilled workers. Others think that major companies should not concern themselves with reducing this pay difference between employees with high pay and those with low pay. On a scale from 1 to 7 (1 meaning that major companies ought to reduce the pay differences between employees with high pay and those with low pay, and 7 meaning that major companies should not concern themselves with reducing pay differences), what score comes closest to the way you feel?
To what extent do you agree or disagree with the statement that workers need strong trade unions to protect their interests?
To what extent do you agree or disagree with the statement that workers should be represented on the board of directors at major companies?
To what extent do you agree or disagree with the statement that the government should ensure that the wages of low-paying jobs increase as the economy grows?
To what extent do you agree or disagree with the following statement? The government should take steps to limit the pay of executives at major companies.
To what extent do you agree or disagree with the following statement? The government should finance projects to create new jobs, even if it might require a tax increase to pay for it.
To what extent do you agree or disagree with the following statement? The government should support declining industries to protect jobs, even if it might require a tax increase to pay for it.

To what extent do you agree or disagree with the following statement? The government should give financial assistance to college students from low-income families, even if it might require a tax increase to pay for it.

Please indicate how much you agree or disagree with the following statement: People who have HIV have participated in immoral activities.
Please indicate how much you agree or disagree with the following statement: There is a lot of discrimination against people with HIV in this country today.

There is a community-wide vote on the general housing issue. There are two possible laws to vote on: One law says that a homeowner can decide whom to sell their house to, even if that homeowner prefers not to sell to someone because of their race or color. The second law says that a homeowner cannot refuse to sell to someone because of their race or color. Which law would you vote for?
Which do you think is most important for people to get ahead: their own hard work, lucky breaks or help from other people?
Should divorce in this country be easier or more difficult to obtain than it is now?
Would you say that most of the time people try to be helpful, or that they are mostly just looking out for themselves?
Do you think most people would try to take advantage of you if they got a chance, or would they try to be fair?
Generally speaking, would you say that most people can be trusted or that you can't be too careful in dealing with people?
Do you think it is generally a good idea or a bad idea for older people to share a home with their grown children?
Do you think the use of marijuana should be made legal or not?
